item.description:
~~~HOLIDAY MIXER~~~

Meetup members, unwind from the daily grind with a cocktail and let your stress melt away on December 8th. Network in a relaxed, lounge setting - making valuable connections for the new year. Several other groups will be invited to this event so a big turnout is expected. This will be a classy event. No cover, just come ready to mingle.

The After Work Series
"Entrepreneur Edition"

Felt Ultra Lounge - 533 Washington St. (Downtown Boston)
Wednesday December 8th
6pm to 9pm

Live Music | Networking | & Dining

Exchange ideas with like minded entrepreneurs & professionals.

Hosted by
Boston Offline, Massachusetts Office of Small Business & Entrepreneurship,
Future Boston Alliance, Onein3 Boston, Night Life Executives LLC, & WBOP

Tweet #Afterworkbiz & Learn how to win $25,000 for your Business
Guest Speaker: Samantha Hammar, Boston Redevelopment Authority

Enjoy Complimentary Appetizers (6pm to 7pm)

(peer pressure time ;-)
Unless you absolutely have work/class at this time there is no excuse for not coming out and enjoying yourself. You've worked hard all year. You joined this meetup to...meet up so let's do it.
You never know who you will meet.

Felt Lounge is conveniently located near the Orange, Red, and Green line and has validated parking for only $10 all night at 1 De Lafayette Avenue
item.name: The After Work Series/ Cocktails & Connections: Holiday Edition Mixer
